conbody.p: Use wcharentrypoint statement to specify that the entry point for a standard EXE is wide character (wmain). Otherwise, the default entry point for a standard EXE is narrow character (main).
This enables the toolchain to include either of the following libraries based on the type of entry point:

li.p: libcrt0.lib — To support the narrow character entry point, if wcharentrypoint statement is not included in the .mmp file.
libwcrt0.lib — To support the wide character entry point, if wcharentrypoint statement is included in the .mmp file.

conbody.p: The wcharentrypoint statement is supported only on ARM ABI and Symbian emulator compliant platforms, such as, ARMv5, ARMv5_ABIv2, GCCE and WINSCW.
